features: Fix and play with the Drill and Learn Toolbox by VTech; open this toddler-friendly toolbox and get ready for role-play fun with the included electronic fix-it tray, working toy drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws
Working drill spins the gears and drills screws into the electronic tray's holes; turn the gears to build motor skills and hear mechanical clicking sounds
Press light-up buttons for fun songs and to learn about a variety of tools, how they're used and the sounds they make
Insert the double-sided instruction cards and learn about colors and numbers while pretending to make repairs; includes an electronic fix-it tray, drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws
Requires 2 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use); intended for ages 2 to 5 years
body.description: Product Description Fix and play with the Drill and Learn Toolbox by VTech! Open this toddler-friendly toolbox and get ready for role-play fun with the included electronic fix-it tray, working toy drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws. Pressing the light-up buttons on the tray will trigger cheerful songs and introduce your little one to a variety of tools, how they're used and the sounds they make. Kids will love turning the colorful gears to hear clicking sounds or using the working toy drill to make them spin. Insert the double-sided instruction cards and learn about colors and numbers while pretending to make repairs. Discover tons of fix-it fun with this learning toolbox! Hammer, wrench, nails, screws and activity cards fit inside. Requires 2 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Intended for ages 2 to 5 years. Brand Story By VTech Manufacturer Contact Information vtech See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Includes: 2 double-sided activity cards, electronic project tray, hand-powered toy drill, hammer, wrench, 2 nails, 2 screws The Tools of the Trade Discover tons of fix-it fun with this interactive toolbox! Press the light-up buttons on the tray to trigger cheerful songs and introduce your little one to a variety of tools, how they’re used and the sounds they make. Kids will love turning the colorful gears to hear clicking sounds or using the working toy drill to make them spin.

Features Interactive Toolbox Enhance language and math skills by using the activity cards or answer the quiz questions using the tools. Light-Up Buttons Press the light-up buttons on the tray to trigger cheerful songs and introduce a variety of tools. Music Fun Features more than 125 songs, melodies, sounds and phrases, including sing-along songs about fixing things and more! Drilling Pretend Play Working drill spins the gears, promoting motor skills while introducing cause and effect.

VTech Drill and Learn Toolbox VTech Scoop and Play Digger LeapFrog Scoop & Learn Ice Cream Cart Deluxe VTech Treasure Seekers Pirate Ship VTech Mix and Match-a-Saurus LeapFrog Smart Sizzlin' BBQ Grill Item Model Number 80-178200 80-518600 80-600761 80-177860 80-518700 80-607900 Age Range 2-5 Years 1.5-4 Years 2-5 Years 1.5-4 Years 2-5 Years 1.5-5 Years Product Description Open the toolbox and get ready for role-play fun with the included drill, hammer, wrench, nails and screws. Load up the fun with the Scoop and Play Digger! Keep little diggers happy with moving gears and five play pieces to scoop up and push out. Create imaginative and tasty-looking ice cream and ice pop treats with colorful toppings. Customers can pay for their treats using the included play money. Little buccaneers can build motor skills with this 2-in-1 ship by moving the sails, spinning the helm, loading the cannon, searching for treasure or rolling the octopus. With the Mix and Match-a-Saurus, kids can create 27 different combinations of emotions, music styles and characters that Dino uses for imaginative play. Little grill masters sizzle up eight play foods with a smart skewer that identifies food, numbers and colors to keep learning on the menu with the Smart Sizzlin' BBQ Grill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Educations fun in a toolbox!
reviews.reviewText: The VTech Drill and Learn Toolbox has been a game-changer for our little one's playtime. This interactive toy combines the excitement of imaginative play with valuable learning experiences, making it a hit in our household.The realistic toolbox design is engaging, and the included drill adds a delightful hands-on element. Our child loves the sound effects and the colorful buttons that light up, making the learning process fun and interactive. The variety of shapes and activities provide educational value while keeping our little one entertained for hours.What we appreciate most about this toolbox is its versatility. It not only helps improve fine motor skills but also introduces basic concepts like colors, shapes, and counting. The durability of the materials ensures that it can withstand the enthusiasm of young builders.As parents, we value toys that are both entertaining and educational, and the VTech Drill and Learn Toolbox checks all the boxes. It's a fantastic addition to any playroom, offering a blend of creativity and learning that keeps kids engaged. Highly recommended for parents looking for a well-designed and educational toy for their little builders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good learning tool
reviews.reviewText: Very good for hand- eye coordination. Plus it's plastic, so it won't hurt furniture that gets 'worked' on. The kids live 'helping' repair things around the house. Minor warning: Some parts may be small enough for putting in mouths.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Drill is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would be a great toy for my newly 2yo daughter who loves to "help" play with tools and Daddy fix things, and I was right! She gravitated straight to use the drill to spin the gears, and was so proud to "do it myself!" Daddy was very enthusiastic that the drill was able to reverse and not only screw in, but unscrew as well with a flip of a little button -- just like a REAL one! Mommy was thrilled that the drill doesn't require batteries.This toy has some really cool features, including the two double-sided cards that fit over the holes and are interactive, helping to teach colors and numbers as your little one hammers/screws. There are buttons on the front that play songs, make noises and light up different colors. Admittedly, there are more realistic toy hammers and wrenches on the market, but the ones in this set are simple and functional with the screws/nails included.When my 2yo allows it (she's still learning to share,) my 5yo son enjoys this toy as well. Since he aspires to be a "Fixer" when he grows up, he has more realistic tool and building toys, but he still plays with this when he gets the opportunity! He really likes the cool reversing function and the ROAR of the drill, and seeing what the interactive cards do. He's been using the drill to "fix" various things around the house. My 11yo daughter isn't much of a handy-person, but she liked listening to the songs and figuring out the different features, too.My only gripe is that the drill can't fit into the toolbox, or there isn't a clamp to attach it to the side for easier storage/organization.I think this toy could appeal to a wide age-range of kids, and would make a fantastic gift. After two weeks, it is still played with daily here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, my boys love it.
reviews.reviewText: I have a 5 and 2.5 year old boys they love this! Although the drill, which is there favorite part broke within minutes. They love to play with this tool box. I would have returned but we destroyed the box trying to open it. The drill was not built to withstand littles at all. :( it was so cool though when it actually worked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler Go To
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly fits my 3 & 2 year old boys who want to help dad with everything. Should have gotten 2 so they don’t fight over it. Everything fits inside and closes up to store neatly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprising amount of features
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this unit. At first I thought it was an OK toy but after experimenting with the interchangable cards, I was surprised to see the amount of features in it. It knows which card is in and makes the games accordingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, nephew loves it
reviews.reviewText: My nephew (3yo) played with this for hours after we got it out of the box for him. He loves the tools and screws. I imagine this will give him endless entertainment for the next year or two.

VTech went all out to build this super cute tool box, everything about it is fun, bright, colourful, works great , easy to use... except the drill... why did they make such a sweet toy and not make a drill to fit INSIDE the toolbox? Consequence, Its been a month and I have no idea where the drill is in the house anymore, it doesn't pack away in the tool box like one might imagine???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter love this, played with it all the time

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente me llego a tiempo y de muy buena calidad.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente calidad y un juguete muy dinamico, lo compre para un regalo y mi sobrino encantado. El tiempo de entrega muy bueno tambien, fue rapido.
My toddler love it. Keeps him busy for long periods of time. It’s very good quality.
